occupation: Managing Partner and CEO-in-Residence at Regenerative Capital Group
headline: Managing Partner and CEO-in-Residence | ex-Salesforce | ex-Xerox
summary:
At Regenerative Capital Group, my focus lies on strategically acquiring and growing businesses within the industrial machinery, medical device, and aviation sectors. Leveraging my expertise in business operations and people management I spearhead initiatives to offer seamless exit strategies and infuse growth capital for sustainable expansion.

My proficiency in digital transformation, cultivating relationships, team leadership and strategy execution has enabled large enterprises across Financial Services, Healthcare and Manufacturing industries to harness new efficiencies and innovations for enhanced business outcomes. Now, these competencies fuel my mission to foster purpose-driven growth and impact in Canadian enterprises.

experiences.title: Managing Partner and CEO-in-Residence
experiences.description:
Regenerative Capital is a private, entrepreneurial investment firm seeking to acquire and grow a single operating and profitable business in Canada. We are able to provide a business owner with an attractive exit opportunity and the company with additional growth capital and management expertise. 

As Managing Partner and CEO-in-Residence I am focused on acquiring and operating a business in the industrial machinery, medical devices or aviation sectors with $1M-$5M in EBITDA. 

Regenerative Capital Group trains and invests in entrepreneurial leaders to acquire Canadian small businesses as a platform for meaningful growth, purpose, profit, and impact. Find out more at www.regenerativecapitalgroup.com

experiences.title: Director, Global Accounts - Insurance
experiences.description: Lead a team of sales and support resources to drive ARR growth and enterprise digital transformation with our largest global insurance customers.

experiences.title: Enterprise Account Executive - Health Insurance
experiences.description: Responsible for selling the value and benefit of Salesforce's full suite of applications to executives at companies with 5,000 to 50,000 employees. Aligned to our top strategic medical device and health insurance accounts in the US and Canada.

experiences.title: Senior Account Executive, Healthcare and Life Sciences - General Business
experiences.description: Strategic consultant responsible for developing relationships, managing complex sales-cycles, and presenting the value of Salesforce.com's full suite of cloud computing applications to C-level executives at companies with between 500 to 5,000 employees.

experiences.title: Senior Account Executive, Commercial Sales - Manufacturing & High Tech
experiences.description: Strategic consultant and advisor to middle market segment. Responsible to drive new ACV and ARR in current and new logo accounts.

volunteer_work.title: Volunteer
volunteer_work.description: 4 consecutive years of volunteering in grade school classrooms to help kids understand the benefits of education and the impact on their career and lifestyle.
